<hr>
<p>
7 years' experience working with data. Expertise in quant. modeling, growing people and making data-driven decisions. Currently working as a <span class="cv-entry-employer">Research Associate (Ph.D.)</span> at the intersection of computer science, statistics and the social sciences as member of both the <span class="cv-entry-employer">Entrepreneurship & Data Science</span> groups.</p>
<p>Seeking a role in the frame of AI and Machine Learning, applying skills from academia and practice. As <span class="cv-entry-employer">Project Manager (AI/ML)</span> at Vattenfall, I am particularly drawn to the development as well as conceptual and strategic advancement of Conversational AI models. (technologies used mostly: <span class="cv-entry-employer">R, SQL and Python</span>).</p>
<hr>
